sv:property.sv:value: One of the most interesting feature about WCM 2.0 is the totally re-written Category Model. We added both a new category management and a symbolic link management to insure a very flexible model. Like your desktop harddrive, you can create Symbolic links but more than that, we manage relations between these shortcuts.

We provide a simple application on the front side so you can subscribe newsletters from the public site (without authentication). If you're a contributor, the Newsletter Manager allows you to create categories and subscriptions. You can also choose the moderator for each category and convert newsletters to template in order to use them later.

eXoPlatform uses and respects full JSR 170 specification to store our data. With our Java Content Repository implementation, you have a native hierarchy structure with powerfull search features and user rights management to secure your contents. Form Generator allows you to create a full compliant JCR nodetype with default dialog and view templates.

For technical partners, we added a Content Composer on top of the Publication Service. You can now create your own publication workflow or adapt it for your needs. You can also use rules to switch between multiple workflows based on the current site, user or content type for example. Contact us on eXo Public Forum for more info.
